      • setBoundingBox

        public void setBoundingBox(IVector rMin,
                           IVector rMax)
        Sets the display bounding box. Atoms outside the box are not draw. The boundary lines are snapped inside the bounding box if they are outside.

        public java.lang.Object makeBond(IAtomList pair,

        Add a bond to the graphical display between the given pairs. The given bondType is used to decide how the bond should be drawn.

      • releaseAgent

        public void releaseAgent(Figure agent,
                         IAtom atom,
                         IBox agentBox)
        Description copied from interface: AtomLeafAgentManager.AgentSource
        This informs the agent source that the agent is going away and that the agent source should disconnect the agent from other elements. The agentBox is provided for convenience for agent sources that handle multiple boxes.
        Specified by:
        releaseAgent in interface AtomLeafAgentManager.AgentSource<Figure>
